section.name: Maven 2
section.div: Configure a dependency in your pom for ${pom.artifactId} and add the Silver Mind Software release and snapshot repos.
section.source:
<dependencies> ... <dependency> <groupId>com.silvermindsoftware.stripes</groupId> <artifactId>stripes-guice</artifactId> <version>1.5-SNAPSHOT</version> <scope>compile</scope> </dependency> ... </dependencies>
<repositories> ... <repository> <id>silvermindsoftware.repo</id> <name>Silvermind Software Release Repo</name> <url>http://m2.silvermindsoftware.com/repo/</url> <releases> <checksumPolicy>fail</checksumPolicy> <updatePolicy>never</updatePolicy> </releases> <snapshots> <enabled>false</enabled> </snapshots> </repository> <repository> <id>silvermindsoftware.snapshot</id> <name>Silvermind Software Snapshot Repo</name> <url>http://m2.silvermindsoftware.com/snapshot/</url> <releases> <enabled>false</enabled> <checksumPolicy>fail</checksumPolicy> </releases> <snapshots> <enabled>true</enabled> </snapshots> </repository> ... </repositories>
